(2000).  “National Monetary Policy by Regional Design:  The  Evolving Role of the Federal Reserve Banks in Federal Reserve System Policy,”  in Jürgen von Hagen and Christopher J. Waller, eds., Regional Aspects of  Monetary Policy in Europe.  Boston:  Kluwer Academic, pp. 241-74.     Williams, John C. (2003). “Simple Rules for Monetary Policy,” Federal Reserve Bank of   San Francisco, Economic Review, pp. 1-12, http://www.frbsf.org/economic- research/files/simple-rules-for-monetary-policy.pdf.
